assigned_cwe_name: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')
cwe_description: The product copies an input buffer to an output buffer without properly checking the size of the input buffer, which can lead to a buffer overflow.
explanation: The code copies insn_len bytes from the insn buffer to ctxt->fetch.data using memcpy. There is no bounds check to ensure that insn_len does not exceed the allocated size of ctxt->fetch.data. If an attacker can provide a value for insn_len that is larger than the capacity of ctxt->fetch.data, this will result in a buffer overflow, potentially leading to denial of service or arbitrary code execution.
